Protocols/PickerNavigationControllerDele.name: pickerStoredFile(picker:response:)
Protocols/PickerNavigationControllerDele.abstract: Called when the picker finishes storing a file originating from a cloud source in the destination storage location.

Protocols/PickerNavigationControllerDele.name: pickerUploadedFiles(picker:responses:)
Protocols/PickerNavigationControllerDele.abstract: Called when the picker finishes uploading a file originating from the local device in the destination storage location.

Protocols/PickerNavigationControllerDele.name: pickerReportedUploadProgress(picker:progress:)
Protocols/PickerNavigationControllerDele.abstract: Called when the picker reports progress during a file or set of files being uploaded.

Protocols/CancellableRequest.html#/c:@M@.name: cancel()
Protocols/CancellableRequest.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Any cancellable requests must implement the cancel() function.

Protocols/CancellableRequest.html.name: CancellableRequest
Protocols/CancellableRequest.html.abstract: This protocol is implemented by any classes representing a request that can be cancelled.

Protocols/PickerNavigationControllerDele.name: PickerNavigationControllerDelegate
Protocols/PickerNavigationControllerDele.abstract: This protocol contains the function signatures any PickerNavigationController delegate should conform to.

Enums/ImageURLExportPreset.html#/c:@M@Fi.name: compatible
Enums/ImageURLExportPreset.html#/c:@M@Fi.abstract: A preset for converting HEIF formatted images to JPEG.

Enums/ImageURLExportPreset.html#/c:@M@Fi.name: current
Enums/ImageURLExportPreset.html#/c:@M@Fi.abstract: A preset for passing image data as-is to the client.

Classes/Stylizer.html#/s:9Filestack8Styl.abstract: Used for changing color of default icons on Picker first view.

Classes/Stylizer.html#/s:9Filestack8Styl.abstract: Used for changing font of text on Picker first view

Classes/Stylizer.html#/s:9Filestack8Styl.abstract: Used for changing color of tableView background.

Classes/Stylizer.html#/s:9Filestack8Styl.abstract: Used for changing default nacigation bar tint color.

Classes/Stylizer.html#/s:9Filestack8Styl.abstract: Used for changing default nacigation bar title color.

Classes/PickerNavigationController.html#.name: stylizer
Classes/PickerNavigationController.html#.abstract: Stylizer used for changing default colors and fonts.

Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.name: showEditorBeforeUpload
Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.abstract: Change this flag to true if you want to allow user to edit photos before the upload.

Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.name: appURLScheme
Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.abstract: An URL scheme supported by the app. This is required to complete the cloud provider’s authentication flow.

Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.name: cloudThumbnailCachePolicy
Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.abstract: This policy controls the thumbnail’s caching behavior when browsing cloud contents in the picker.

Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.name: kMaximumSelectionNoLimit
Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.abstract: Use this value if you want to allow user for selecting unlimited number of assets to upload.

Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.name: maximumSelectionAllowed
Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.abstract: This controls if user can select more than one image/document for upload.

Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.name: modalPresentationStyle
Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.abstract: This settings determines the way we want to present document picker, image pickers and upload monitor.

Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.name: availableCloudSources
Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.abstract: This setting determines what cloud sources are available when using the picker.

Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.name: availableLocalSources
Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.abstract: This setting determines what local sources are available when using the picker.

Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.name: documentPickerAllowedUTIs
Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.abstract: This setting determines what document types can be picked when using Apple’s document picker.

Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.name: cloudSourceAllowedUTIs
Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.abstract: This setting determines what document types can be picked from a cloud source.

Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.name: imageURLExportPreset
Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.abstract: This setting determines the format used for exported images (available only in iOS 11.)

Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.name: imageExportQuality
Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.abstract: This setting determines the quality setting for images taken using the camera and exported either as HEIC or JPEG.

Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.name: videoExportPreset
Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.abstract: This setting determines the format used for exported videos (available only in iOS 11.)

Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.name: videoQuality
Classes/Config.html#/s:9Filestack6Config.abstract: This setting determines the video recording quality for videos recorded using the camera.

Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.name: apiKey
Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.abstract: An API key obtained from the Developer Portal.

Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.name: upload(from:storeOptions:useIntelligentIngestionIfAvailable:queue:uploadProgress:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.abstract: Uploads a file directly to a given storage location (currently only S3 is supported.)

Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.name: uploadFromImagePicker(viewController:sourceType:storeOptions:useIntelligentIngestionIfAvailable:queue:uploadProgress:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.abstract: Uploads a file to a given storage location picked interactively from the camera or the photo library.

Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.name: uploadFromDocumentPicker(viewController:storeOptions:useIntelligentIngestionIfAvailable:queue:uploadProgress:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.abstract: Uploads a file to a given storage location picked interactively from the device’s documents, iCloud Drive or

Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.name: folderList(provider:path:pageToken:queue:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.abstract: Lists the content of a cloud provider at a given path. Results are paginated (see pageToken below.)

Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.name: store(provider:path:storeOptions:queue:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.abstract: Stores a file from a given cloud provider and path at the desired store location.

Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.name: picker(storeOptions:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.abstract: Returns an instance of a PickerNavigationController that will allow the user to interactively pick files from

Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.name: logout(provider:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:9Filestack6Client.abstract: Logs out the user from a given provider.

Classes/StoreResponse.html#/s:9Filestack.name: contents
Classes/StoreResponse.html#/s:9Filestack.abstract: The contents payload as a dictionary containing details about the operation response.

Classes/StoreResponse.html#/c:@M@Filesta.name: authURL
Classes/StoreResponse.html#/c:@M@Filesta.abstract: A redirect URL to a cloud provider’s OAuth page. Typically this is only required internally.

Classes/FolderListResponse.html#/s:9File.name: contents
Classes/FolderListResponse.html#/s:9File.abstract: The contents payload as an array of dictionaries, where each dictionary represents an entry in the cloud.

Classes/FolderListResponse.html#/s:9File.name: nextToken
Classes/FolderListResponse.html#/s:9File.abstract: A next token used for pagination purposes. Optional.

Classes/FolderListResponse.html#/c:@M@Fi.name: authURL
Classes/FolderListResponse.html#/c:@M@Fi.abstract: A redirect URL to a cloud provider’s OAuth page. Typically this is only required internally.

Classes/FolderListResponse.html.name: FolderListResponse
Classes/FolderListResponse.html.abstract: This class represents a response obtained from a cloud folder list request.

Classes/LogoutResponse.html.name: LogoutResponse
Classes/LogoutResponse.html.abstract: This class represents a response obtained from a cloud logout request.

Classes/StoreResponse.html.name: StoreResponse
Classes/StoreResponse.html.abstract: This class represents a response obtained from a cloud store request.

Classes/Client.html.name: Client
Classes/Client.html.abstract: The Client class provides an unified API to upload files and manage cloud contents using Filestack REST APIs.

Classes/Config.html.name: Config
Classes/Config.html.abstract: The Config class is used together with Client to configure certain aspects of the API.

Classes/PickerNavigationController.html.name: PickerNavigationController
Classes/PickerNavigationController.html.abstract: This class represents a navigation controller containing UI elements that allow picking files from local and cloud

Classes/CloudSource.html.name: CloudSource
Classes/CloudSource.html.abstract: Represents a type of cloud source to be used in the picker.

Classes/LocalSource.html.name: LocalSource
Classes/LocalSource.html.abstract: Represents a type of local source to be used in the picker.

Classes/Stylizer.html.name: Stylizer
Classes/Stylizer.html.abstract: Object used to pass set colors, fonts and defaults style of Picker.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
